title: How to buy the right wireless charger
description: Buying a wireless charger for your phone can be surprisingly difficult. The spec itself is pretty simple: just drop your phone on a charger and go, but when it comes to actually buying that charger, there are a ton of options out there. Some charge at different speeds, some have different form factors, and some dont include everything you need in the box. So to help you out, weve put together a guide of what to look for in a wireless charger for your next phone.
